sections.heading: Effect of mortgage filed after death of mortgagorA judgment or a conventional mortgage filed for recordation more than twenty days after the mortgagor dies gives no preference to the mortgagee over the other creditors of the estate of the deceased if the estate is insufficient to satisfy all the cre
sections.text: Effect of mortgage filed after death of mortgagorA judgment or a conventional mortgage filed for recordation more than twenty days after the mortgagor dies gives no preference to the mortgagee over the other creditors of the estate of the deceased if the estate is insufficient to satisfy all the creditors.Acts 1992, No. 1132, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 1993.{{NOTE: FORMER ART. 3326 REPEALED BY ACTS 1992, NO. 1132, ยง1, EFF. JAN. 1, 1993.}}
